full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL BA'I LUNG ZIN CHOS SDE CHEN PO SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING GI GZHI BDAG LE'U CHE'I GSOL MCHOD CHA LAG DANG BCAS PA DGOS 'DOD 'JO BA'I YID BZHIN LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES RGYAL BA'I LUNG ZIN CHOS SDE CHEN PO SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING GI GZHI BDAG LE'U CHE'I GSOL MCHOD CHA LAG DANG BCAS PA DGOS 'DOD 'JO BA'I YID BZHIN LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA @010B 'DI NI, KHAL KHA SAN NO YON GYI RGYAL KHAG ZAS TI SE CHE WANG SHOG GI DGON SDE BYANG ROL BKRA SHIS THEG CHEN GLING GI GRVA RIGS, CHOS SRID KYI GNAS LA BLO GROS KYI 'JUG PA MCHOG TU YANGS PA'I SMAN RAMS PA SE CHEN CHOS RJE YE SHES TSE RING GIS RAB DKAR LHA RDZAS, MIG SHEL KHYAD MTSAR CAN SOGS KYI SKYES DANG BCAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^SH'AKYA'I RJES SU 'JUG PA'I SNGAGS 'CHANG RGAN PO BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO 'JIGS MED ZIL GNON RDO RJE SGRA DBYANGS DBANG PO'I SDES SBYAR BA'O,, ,,TSUL 'DI KHAL KHA SE CHEN RGYAL KHAG GI ,BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG CHEN PO T'A CANG JUN, ,SE CHE PE LI TSE RING BSAM GRUB DANG, GA-YONG DRUNG RDO RJE YID BZHIN 'KHOR LO BCAS, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE DPAR DU BSGRUBS PA'I DGES, ,SKYE BA'I PHRENG BAR DAL 'BYOR RTEN BZANG THOB ,DRIN CAN BLA MA MCHOG DANG MI 'BRAL ZHING, ,SA LAM YON TAN YONGS SU MTHAR PHYIN SHOG ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO,
